description: Gets the resource policy and policy revision for a bot or bot alias.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the bot or bot alias that the resource policy is attached to.

nested_items.name: resourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the bot or bot alias that the resource policy is attached to.

nested_items.name: policy
nested_items.description: The JSON structure that contains the resource policy. For more information about the contents of a JSON policy document, see IAM JSON policy reference.

nested_items.name: revisionId
nested_items.description: The current revision of the resource policy. Use the revision ID to make sure that you are updating the most current version of a resource policy when you add a policy statement to a resource, delete a resource, or update a resource.
